name: Relais Villa L'Olmo

reviews.text: Stayed here in August and had a very good time. We had a two bedroom apartment with a sitting room and small kitchen. The aprtment was quite large and the bedrooms were comfortable.
reviews.title: Convenient and Comfortable

reviews.text: The Relais has a very nice swimming pool and a lovely view over the valley with Impruneta on the hill. As a previous reviewer has said Impruneta is not a medieval tuscan town, but it's really quite pleasant with many decent to very good restaurants. I forget the name but the one in the main square (top right of the square if looking from the church) was really excellent.
reviews.title: Relaxing farm atmosphere

reviews.text: The Relais also own a restaurant just a few minutes walk away and this was serves everything from Pizza to Bisteca - well worth a visit.
reviews.title: Home away from home

reviews.text: Going south from Impruneta you are immediately in classic tuscan countryside, but best of all you are just 15 minutes by car from Florence. We went in several times and parked just around the corner from the Pitti Palace. Florence of course is marvellous, but staying just outside in the hot summer is a good idea.
reviews.title: Not what i expected.
Looks pretty...but
reviews.text: The Relais is not the height of luxury but very convenient and comfortable. We enjoyed our week there a lot.

This place is just gorgeous. We drove from bologna airport and got lost...we were all in pretty bad moods when we got to this place but the minuite we pulled into the drive we all thought it was worth it. The villa's themselves are made from stone and just look great and are nice and clean inside. The pool overlooks the most amazing scenery and there is a bbq and seating area overlooking the pool. The town is pretty small but a bus service goes to florence every couple of hours and the bus stop is just across the road from the villa's. Florence itself is lovely but it is nice to stay a bit outside it if you want a relaxing holiday.
reviews.title: amazing

reviews.text: The Relais has been our choice of accommodation in Tuscany for seven stays over a period of several years. It offers flexible stays (similar types of accommodation offer stays by the week only) and also has a variety of accommodation types from apartments for couples to houses for larger parties. It is immaculately maintained and represents excellent value. The staff are extremely helpful, cheerful and friendly. The fact that the owners live on the property ensures that high standards are maintained. At the same time the privacy of guests is respected to the utmost. From here, Florence is a 25 minute ride on an air-conditioned bus at a cost of less than €2. It is a very attractive option to enduring the challenge of driving in the city then paying the very high parking rates. After a summer day in Florence, what a pleasure to return to the pool and the peacefulness of Villa l'Olmo. The location is a 2 minute walk from Impruneta which has a selection of restaurants and a food Co-op. From here, day trips into Chianti and beyond are a breeze. I would unequivocally recommend it to anyone considering a visit to Florence or the area.
reviews.title: Every stay has been a delight

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Unless you despirately wish to stay in Florence, quit looking at all these reviews and book this property. This hotel is an incredible find. The rooms were very clean, staff was very friendly, the view is INCREDIBLE. The rates are amoung the best we saw in our 15 day trip thru Italy.
reviews.title: Wow - book now!

likes.disliked: — I could only stay for 2 nights

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bus is very convenient to downtown Florence, there are great restaurants in the little town of Impruneta plus a COOP (grocery store). The only thing I can come up with that is a negative is that the remote for the AC has to be rented. But that is it.
reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic
Average
reviews.text: We stayed here for 2 nights (2 couples in a 2 bdrm apt) and we could have stayed there for a week.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This place was a real find – it is real rustic Tuscany – not too many tourists
reviews.title: Great Place Great views - just great

likes.disliked: — could't get the apartment with the views the 2nd time we stayed there - it was already booked

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Amazing views – never got to check out the local village but seemed really good – lots of life
reviews.title: Romance at the Relais...

reviews.text: All apartments or houses – if your budget can stretch to it get a privates villa – mine didn’t – ask for the REALLY PRIVATE one – there are 2
reviews.title: Excellent villa in tuscany
memorable Villa L'olmo
reviews.text: Nice swimming pool and great staff –

reviews.title: Easter Sunshine in Impruneta
reviews.text: Best bit about this place is the restaurant right beside it – go to the top of the road and take a left a the roundabout (100m away) and then another 100m down the road is the restaurant on the left – best mean I had in Italy and the place was full of locals – always a good sign and the staff were cool

reviews.title: Loved this place - would recommend to anyone!
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at Relais Villa L'Olmo mid September. Upon arrival we were mesmerised by the beautiful scenery and views. We had seen roughly what it would like from the internet site but nothing prepares you for it when you see it with your own eyes on a beautiful evening with the sun setting behind the vineyards and olive groves.
We checked in and were pleased to have been upgraded to a 2 bed apartment. It was charming - so rustic and the views from our windows were stunning. The staff were so helpful and friendly.
reviews.title: Good but not great

reviews.text: It was so quiet and peaceful there. They have their own wine that you can buy for €5 which was great as well as bottled beers. The local coop supermarket had everything we needed for simple lunches and in the evening there were plenty of restaurant choices, the closest was the Cavalier (or something like that) and we really enjoyed our meals there so went twice, plus it was only 3 mins walk.
reviews.title: Classy and peaceful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool area was lovely with sand and although the pool wasnt heated and so too cold to swim, it was lovely just to sit down there.
reviews.title: The Best Place to Stay in Tuscany

reviews.text: The breakfasts are simple but adequate. We used the shuttle bus to and from Florence, it was punctual, cheap and a great way to see the local area. Hiring a car would be nervewracking with all those twists and turns and fast drivers!
reviews.title: Four Star Relais L'Olmo

description: Relais Villa L'Olmo lies in the famous Chianti countryside. It is only 10 km from Florence and the Airport.It is also 5 km from the motorway (A1) for Milan and Rome and the speedway to Siena. The village of Impruneta is within a short walking distance.Inside each apartment there is a living room, a fully equipped kitchen area, bedrooms, bathrooms, direct phones, satellite TV, DVD players, air conditioning, independent heating system, large swimming pool area and beautiful gardens. The private cottages offer the same comforts but they also have their own private pool and garden.
